Richard Nii Armah Quaye bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Ghana, onye nchoputa, onye isi ọrụ na onye isi oche nke Quick Angels Limited yana kredit ngwa ngwa na itinye ego obere ego.. A na-azọrọ na ọ bụ mmụọ ozi mbụ na-etinye ego na Ghana.
A mụrụ Quaye na 21 Maachị 1984 wee si Jamestown na mpaghara Accra Kasị Ukwuu na Ghana

Quaye malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego ma na 8 Mee 2019, o guzobere Quick Angels Limited nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite mmalite na azụmaahịa na Ghana. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akwadowo azụmaahịa dịka Pizzaman Chicken man, Ridge Medical Centre, Doughman Foods, CoLi Network, Goldcoast Food, Herbs and Spices, ndị na-emepụta Sankofa Natural Spices, Addicent Foods, ndị na'emepụta Benjie na Duke rice, Zaconut, na Burger King, n'etiti ndị ọzọ.
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, o kwuru okwu na mbipụta nke atọ nke Entrepreneurs Forum site na Ghana Investment Promotion Council.
N'ọnwa Disemba 2019, Entrepreneurship Through Acquisition, otu klọb azụmaahịa na Harvard Business School kpọrọ ya ka ọ kwuo okwu na nnọkọ nke ise ha na-eme kwa afọ.
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, Quaye meriri na ngalaba Investment Award.

Na Septemba 2020, Quaye pụtara dị ka onye mmeri n'ozuzu na 2020 40 n'okpuru 40 awards na Kempinski Hotel na Accra O kwuru ọzọ na ọ bụ ụdị onyinye itinye ego. O nwetakwara ihe nrite European CEO Entrepreneur of the year 2020.
N'ọnwa Mee 2021, ọ natakwara onye ọchụnta ego na-ahụ maka ọrụ ego na onye isi oche pụtara ìhè na 2021 11th Ghana Entrepreneur and Corporate Executive Awards
N'ọnwa Julaị na Ọgọstụ 2021, ọ natara onyinye Outstanding Business Investor Awards na Outstanding Business Leader na 2021 Ghana Business Standards Awards.
